$$death_age = \beta{0} + \beta{1} treatmenti + \beta{2}win_margini + \
\beta{4}repubi + \beta{5}thirdpartyi + \epsilon{i}$$





```{r}
#| label: setup
#| message: false
#| cache: true
library(tidyverse)
library(primer.data)
library(brms)
library(tidybayes)
library(gtsummary)
```

```{r}
x <- governors |> 
  select(death_age, election_age, win_margin, party, sex) |> 
  mutate(treatment = ifelse(win_margin > 0, "win", "lose")) |> 
  filter(abs(win_margin) < 5) 

fit_elec_1 <- brm(formula = death_age ~ treatment + win_margin +
                 party,
                  data = x,
                  family = gaussian(),
                  refresh = 0,
                  silent = 2,
                  seed = 9)

fixef(fit_elec_1)

tbl_regression(fit_elec_1, 
               intercept = TRUE)
```
